title: spacing & kerning classes
content: I am looking for some ready to use metrics and [kerning](http://web.archive.org/web/20140714075356/http:/typophile.com/wiki/kerning) classes text files. Do you know where I can find some ?
author: docunagi

comments.content:
You're on your own wih metrics: good metrics are the most important thing when designing a typeface (in my opinion.)

But, I have posted one of my class-based OpenType kern features here:  
 [http://vllg.com/files/OpenType\_kerning/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140714075356/http:/vllg.com/files/OpenType_kerning/)

I hope this is helpful to you.
thanks guys :) I guess I will have to create my own spacing assistance file :)

Hi Docunagi  
Here is a link to Leslie Cabarga's [Kern King.](http://web.archive.org/web/20140714075356/http:/www.logofontandlettering.com/kernking.html) A list of words and letters very useful for spacing and kerning your font.

Magnus
